name: Pumpkin Carving (Blit Blat Games)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Type the GREEN letters if they appear in the word PUMPKIN


Ignore ORANGE letters 

Press SPACE if the GREEN letter is not in PUMPKIN

Click on GHOSTS to scare them away

You have 60 SECONDS

Good Luck! 

Created by @BlitBlatGames

Music by @8bitJackie
